author: trawick
msg: Fix a problem with the last commit...  I missed one of the hashing changes
so some of the code had an unnecessary IPv4 assumption.

author: trawick
msg: Get rid of some IPv4 dependencies by passing the hash function the

msg: Fix the call to apr_snprintf() for formatting the sockaddr in
